CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Copolymers P1-P4 were synthesized through Stille coupling reaction of the dibromide monomers 5a,b or 7a with benzodithiophene-2,6-ditin or 2,2 0 -bithiazole-5,5 0 -ditin , while P5 was synthesized through Suzuki coupling reaction of the dibromide monomer 5b with benzothiadiazole-4,7-diboronic ester.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Copolymers P1-P4 |
| Dibromide monomers 5a,b |
| Benzodithiophene-2,6-ditin |
| 2,2 `0`-bithiazole-5,5 `0`-ditin |
| Dibromide monomer 5b |
| Benzothiadiazole-4,7-diboronic ester |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Copolymers P1-P4 |
| Dibromide monomer 5a |
| Dibromide monomer 5b |
| Benzodithiophene-2,6-ditin |
| 2,2 `0`-bithiazole-5,5 `0`-ditin |
| Benzothiadiazole-4,7-diboronic ester |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |

Note: The "dibromide monomers" and "boronic ester" are not material properties, but they are mentioned in the context of the reaction processes used to synthesize the polymers, so they are included for completeness but labeled as "reaction components" instead of "material properties".

| 2,2 0 -bithiazole-5,5 0 -ditin |
